attributes.action: Before taking up a post as chief executive or another similar such post, the candidate should live for a year on the lowest full time wage that the or
attributes.additional_details: In a time when the gap between the highest and the lowest earners is getting ever bigger. Maybe it should be time for those at the top of the largest corporate organisations to understand how it is to live at the bottom. I porpose that before taking a job as a CEO or similar the person must live for a year on the wage of the lowest full time employee with no other financial support.
